text: 18:22: Ezkh 26:13; Aij 24:8 18:22,23: Jeri 7:34; 25:10Benthek pha thiibiingkhinkheb nane tharohthamang goh pha, flui boi pha ji nane thu-ung ne nathek ro iliing shii khuchungde din ne ayoi sha ruii phro; chiih-è chongjai rek pha ne nathek ro iliing shii adoh sha phro, chiih-è rathak pha roh ne oi sha ruii phro!
